channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Adobe shares suffer steepest drop in over two years on disappointing revenue guidance
item.description: Adobe shares tumbled after the software vendor issued revenue guidance that fell short of analysts' estimates.

item.title: Macy's employee who hid $151 million in delivery expenses was trying to mask initial mistake, sources say
item.description: The department store operator slightly raised its full-year forecast, while still projecting a sales decline.

item.title: Cocoa Surges Past $12,000 on Supply Concerns
item.description: Prices have more than doubled since the start of the year, as severe droughts resulted in poor harvests in Ghana and Ivory Coast—the world’s biggest p...

item.title: U.S. Stocks Rise Ahead of Interest-Rate Decision
item.description: U.S. stocks rose as the Fed is overwhelmingly expected to cut interest rates this afternoon, but the case for continued reductions is less clear.

item.title: Costco beats on earnings as e-commerce sales jump
item.description: Costco drew stronger online sales and higher traffic, as shoppers bought jewelry, luggage and more.

item.title: U.S. Crude Oil Stocks Fall Less Than Expected
item.description: U.S. crude-oil inventories fell for a fourth consecutive week, but the decline was smaller than analysts had forecast.

item.title: AI chipmaker Broadcom shares soar 17% despite mixed quarterly results — here's why
item.description: We're increasing our price target on the stock after a slew of positive AI updates.

item.title: Treasury Yields Rise Ahead of Expected Fed Cut
item.description: Treasury yields were higher ahead of the Fed decision, while weakening a bit on U.S. housing data.

item.title: Dollar Likely to Stay Firm Until Year-End, Helped by Fed
item.description: The dollar is likely to remain firm until year-end as the Federal Reserve could scale back its guidance for interest-rate cuts next year, says ING. On...

item.title: Costco quarter signals record stock run is not done yet. Here's our new price target
item.description: With gross margins and paid memberships trending higher, this rally to fresh highs can continue.
